amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No.9, consisting of amendments numbered 8, 15, 30, 32, 55, 61, 64, 66, 67, 74, and 77 printed in House Report 111-498.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos. 8, 15, 30, 32, as modified, 55, 61, 64, 66, 67, 74, and 77 printed in House Report 111-498.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 1 (Roll no. 333).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A023) offered by Mr. Skelton.
